resources.string: Backup not saved. Not enough space left on SD card. Lower the backup depth or remone some other files.
Kurang dari %d ruang dalam kad sd.\nKosongkan sedikit lagi untuk data tambahan.
Hapus koleksi dan buat yang baru
Apakah Anda benar-benar ingin menghapus koleksi dan membuat yang baru? Ini akan menghapus semua kemajuan belajar Anda dan menghapus semua kartu!
Overwrite your collection with the one from AnkiWeb? This will drop all your learning progress and added information since your last sync.
The selected backup file was invalid
No backups available on this device. If you have backups on your desktop computer, copy them manually into your AnkiDroid folder.

Database couldn’t be opened. It’s either not a real Anki database or has been corrupted.

Touch “options” for various options to restore the database, or for more information about repairing corrupted collections see:
%1$s

Your collection has become corrupted.

Touch “options” to restore from a backup, or if that doesn’t work, see the following instructions for manually repairing the database:
%1$s

An error occurred while accessing your collection. It may have been caused by a harmless bug, or there may be a problem with it. 

Try running check database, or restoring from backup by pressing the “options” button. If you continue to see this message, please file a bug report:
%1$s
The Android size limit for a String in a database has been exceeded. Delete any unused note types using Anki desktop, then do a full sync.
